name: Kimi
simple_intro: I am a junior Front-end developer working with JavaScript, Vue.js 3, and Vite. I have experience in both solo and team-based side projects.
My past job involved long-term project management and planning, including database platform functions and metadata writing rules, exhibition curating, and book editing.
My expected working development focuses on data processing and application presentation.
I enjoy being close to nature, especially hiking!
